condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened institutional frameworks to prevent and respond to violence, abuse and exploitation of children

description.narrative: National plans of action to end VAC, OSAEC, and protect the rights of CICL are operationalized by Government. As part of fulfilling national plans, further evidence generation was conducted and was used in public and advocacy campaigns and capacity building activities while capacity building efforts are supported by UNICEF. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/01/2019

title.narrative: National Response Plan to Prevent and Address Online Abuse and Exploitation operationalized

actual.value: 2018:Continued support for the operationalization of the NRP, including development of the unified advocom plan, roll out of the CET-OSEC, enhancement of MDT.
2018:Government partners have begun implementing the PPAEVAC in areas covered by their mandate. However, coordinated implementation and localization is still in very early stage.
2019:All regional offices have localized the CNJIP. Tools have been developed. Capacity building plans through OBET-JJ implemented. HLAF was able to localize CNJIP in 5 LGUs.
